member.summary: Name of this document type

member.summary: Icon property of a Document Type. Default value: folder.gif.

member.summary: Thumbnail property of a Document Type. Default value: folder.png

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypeAttribute.Description
member.summary: Description of a Document Type Default value: empty

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypeAttribute.DefaultTemplate
member.summary: Default template for this Document Type. Default value: If there's only one template in application that is strongly typed with this Document Type, then DefaultTemplate will be automatically set to that Document Type. If there are two or more templates strongly typed with this Document Type, then DefaultTemplate will be left empy (so user can choose template when creating content).

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypeAttribute.AllowedChildNodeTypes
member.summary: Defines which child nodes can be created as a content nodes under content node of this document type.

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.ManagerBase.AddToSynchronized(System.String,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: This method checks if an item with the given name and alias is already synchronized. This method is used to used as a constraint that all items must have unique names and aliases.

Alias of an item for synchronization.

member.name: T:Vega.USiteBuilder.Global
member.summary: Intercepts application events from IIS. This class subclasses Umbraco Global class so it is safe to deploy Global.asax associated with this class to IIS website. When deploying this class to Umbraco IIS website, existing App_global.asax.dll must be deleted (which is safe since this class subclasses Umbraco's Global class).

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.Global.Init
member.summary: Intercepts Init function of a Global class. Used to synchronize application data model with Umbraco database.

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.Global.Application_BeginRequest(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Intercepts begin request event and checks if synchronization is already done. If yes, it does nothing. If not, it retries synchronization.

member.name: T:Vega.USiteBuilder.Constants
member.summary: Contains various application wide constants

member.summary: Registers document type property convertor.

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.ContentHelper.GetChildren``1(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets all children nodes of a given type from a given node id.
member.param: Parent node id of all children to get
If true it does deep search for children in the whole content tree starting from node whose id is parentId)

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.ContentHelper.GetChildren``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all children nodes of a given type from a given node id. Note: This method returns only first level children - it doesn't return children's children.
member.param: Parent node id of all children to get

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.ContentHelper.GetChildren(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all children nodes from a given node id. Note: This method returns only first level children - it doesn't return children's children.
member.param: Parent node id of all children to get

member.summary: Get's the content item by node id.
member.param: Node Id associated with the content item

member.summary: Get's the content item by node.
member.param: node associated with the content item

member.summary: Get's the content item by node.
member.param: node associated with the content item

member.summary: Gets the content by XPath query

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.ContentHelper.Save(Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypeBase)
member.summary: Updates or adds the content item using current user. If content item already exists, it updates it. If content item doesn't exists, it creates new content item.

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.ContentHelper.Save(Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypeBase,umbraco.BusinessLogic.User)
member.summary: Updates or adds the content item. If content item already exists, it updates it. If content item doesn't exists, it creates new content item.
member.param: User used for add or updating the content

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.ContentHelper.DeleteContent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the content specified by id

member.summary: Returns true if content item is deleted and currently contained in the recycle bin.

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.TemplateAttribute.AllowedForDocumentType
member.summary: Default value of this property is true. Indicates if this template should be set as allowed template for a DocumentType to which this template is strongly typed. Note: if this template is not strongly typed than setting this property makes not sense and is ignored.

member.name: T:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute
member.summary: Marks the property as a document type property

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute.#ctor(Vega.USiteBuilder.UmbracoPropertyType)
member.summary: Only umbraco data type is required. If you don't specify other named parameters, default values will be used.
member.param: Umbraco Data Type related with this property

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute.Name
member.summary: Name of this property. If name is not specified, name of the class is taken as a property name.

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute.Type
member.summary: Sets the corresponding umbraco data type. For types not covered with this enumeration (including custom types) use UmbracoPropertyType.Other and than set OtherTypeName attribute.

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute.OtherTypeName
member.summary: Name of the a data type. This property is used only if Type is set to UmbracoPropertyType.Other.

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute.Tab
member.summary: Tab on which this property will be shown. If specified Tab does not exists in this document type it will be automatically created.

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute.Mandatory
member.summary: Indicates if this property is mandatory when user creates content.

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute.ValidationRegExp
member.summary: Validation reg expression.

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute.Description
member.summary: Property type description

member.name: P:Vega.USiteBuilder.DocumentTypePropertyAttribute.DefaultValue
member.summary: Default value for the property. Note that setting up default values for properties whose type is a complex type (e.g. Related links) requires this value to be right formated xml.

member.name: T:Vega.USiteBuilder.Util
member.summary: Contains various utility methods

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.Util.GetFirstLevelSubTypes(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets all first level subtypes (directly inherited types) of type given as argument.

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.Util.GetAllSubTypes(System.Type)
member.summary: Get's all subtypes of a given type.

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.Util.GetSiteBuilderUmbracoUser
member.summary: Returns login name of Umbraco user used by USiteBuilder (for creating document types, templates etc...)

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.Util.GetAttribute``1(System.Type)
member.summary: Get's the attribute of a given type from the given type. Note that if there are multiple attributes of the same type found, this method returns on the first one so use this method only for searching attributes whose AllowMultiple is set to false.
member.param: Type whose attributes will be searched
member.returns: Attribute found or null of attribute is not found

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.Util.GetAttribute``1(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Get's the attribute of a given type from the given type. Note that if there are multiple attributes of the same type found, this method returns on the first one so use this method only for searching attributes whose AllowMultiple is set to false.
member.param: PropertyInfo whose attributes will be searched
member.returns: Attribute found or null of attribute is not found

member.name: M:Vega.USiteBuilder.Util.IsGenericArgumentTypeOf(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns true if typeArgument is used as an argument in generic type typeGeneric.
member.returns: true if typeArgument is used as an argument in generic type typeGeneric
